title: Emergency Evacuation Guideline Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic safety management concepts and experience with VR simulation tools
context.additional_context: Operated as an elective course during the semester, including practical assessments linked to the school's safety management system.

learning_goals: Learners analyze emergency evacuation routes in VR simulation environments to derive optimal movement paths
Learners design and evaluate evacuation guidance documents considering visual cognitive elements
Learners propose at least three evacuation strategies reflecting group psychological factors
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
